channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Window to define Harris rapidly closing as favorability rating rises in new poll
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris' approval rating is rising, surging past both President Biden and former President Trump in a new poll.

item.title: Trump will campaign across the country this week as he struggles to adjust to Harris
item.description: As Democrats kick off their convention in Chicago, Donald Trump 's campaign is trying to regain its footing after weeks of struggling to adjust to Vice President Kamala Harris at the top of the opposing ticket.

item.title: Price Controls: Politics and Policy
item.description: The week of August 12, 2024: Prices (and their uses), trade, industrial policy, Argentina, and much, much, more.

item.title: Georgia County Will Force Citizens To Pay To Help Clean Up Voting Rolls
item.description: The Cobb County Board of Elections and Registration adopted a rule Tuesday requiring people who challenge a potentially ineligible voter to pay to notify that voter.

item.title: Fetterman spokeswoman reamed for reportedly contradicting boss on Israel: 'Unparalleled hubris'
item.description: Carrie Adams, communications director for Sen. John Fetterman, reportedly told a reporter she disagrees with her boss' stance on Israel and claimed the younger generation shares a more nuanced view.

item.title: Democrats open their convention transformed by Harris' ascendance but facing lingering questions
item.description: A refreshed Democratic Party reintroduces itself to a divided nation this week, having been transformed by the money, momentum, relief and even joy that followed Vice President Kamala Harris ' rise to the top of its ticket.

item.title: A Salzburg Sampler
item.description: On a quartet of performances at this summer’s Salzburg Festival.

item.title: Ignoring Joe Biden’s Corruption Tells The World America Is Corrupt
item.description: The nearly 300-page report on Biden family corruption matters for many reasons, the most important of which is to restore America’s standing in the world.

item.title: Bipartisan lawmakers put UN on notice over 'rampant anti-Israel bias'
item.description: Reps. Mike Lawler and Jared Moskowitz are spearheading a bill threatening U.S. funding to the United Nations if it moves to restrict Israel's access to the international body.

item.title: Trump gears up for week of DNC counter-programming with full schedule of campaign events
item.description: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump has a busy week ahead as he looks to steal some of Vice President Kamala Harris' thunder during her coronation week at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.

item.title: Kamala Harris Proposes Bidenomics, but Bigger
item.description: For progressives who somehow thought Biden was too moderate, a President Harris would kick things up a notch — no matter the consequences.

item.title: Conservative Families To Dwarf Drag Queen Story Hour’s World Record With Second ‘See You At The Library Day’
item.description: 'These are the kinds of books that are fun, imaginative, but they're reinforcing the worldview and the values that parents so desperately want.'

item.title: SEE IT: Protests erupt, businesses board up outside the DNC in Chicago
item.description: Images show protesters gathering outside of the Democratic National Convention (DNC), and police brace for unrest throughout the four-day event.

item.title: Harris and Trump offer worlds-apart contrasts on top issues in presidential race
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris has replaced President Joe Biden atop the presidential ticket, but his "finish the job" campaign mantra can still largely apply to her top policy goals. She's promising to continue a lot of what Biden was doing during the past four years if she's elected to four of her own.

item.title: Passing Educational-Freedom Legislation Is Only the First Step
item.description: School-choice advocates face challenges beyond just implementation, even in friendly states.

item.title: House Report: Joe Biden’s Obstruction, Sale Of Government Power To Foreign Adversaries Merit Impeachment
item.description: House Republicans published a report Monday presenting the evidence against President Joe Biden as guilty of 'impeachable offenses.'

item.title: Former President Bill Clinton’s second term as POTUS was entangled with scandal, ended with impeachment
item.description: Bill Clinton spent two terms in the White House from 1993 until 2001. Following his own presidential term, he supported his wife, Hillary, in her run for office in 2016.

item.title: Anti-Israel protesters crash DNC welcome party in Chicago
item.description: Anti-Israel protesters quickly made their presence known in the Windy City among Democratic National Committee attendees when they crashed a delegate welcome party before the convention officially started.

item.title: State Taxes: Good Cuts, Bad Cuts
item.description: Annual legislative sessions have wrapped up, and taxpayers have once again gained ground.

item.title: Kamala Harris And Tim Walz Are The Ultimate DEI Ticket
item.description: Neither Trump nor his allies should be afraid to attack the moral bankruptcy of DEI that has fueled the policy disasters of Harris and Walz.
